title: Westchase Full Size Washer and Dryer, Doorbell, Alarm System
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
Wrapped in the same earth-tone hues, inviting charm and soft ambience of Spanish Mediterranean villages built centuries ago, we present a modern menu of new world luxuries.
The first component provides the personal privacy of a great residential address within an urban utopia that feels more like an old world neighborhood.
Enveloped by stately Live Oak trees, we promise a lifestyle that is, literally, made in the shade.
Personal parking access to each floor
Video monitors on main access gates
Private balconies with wrought iron railings
Additional phone lines for internet and fax
